gen:link.msg:message: `AccruedIncome` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_AccruedIncome')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_AccruedIncome return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfAccruedIncomeCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReceivablesOtherCurrent` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ReceivablesOtherCurrent')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ReceivablesOtherCurrent return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfReceivablesOtherCurrentDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfReceivablesOtherCurrentDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfReceivablesOtherCurrentCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfReceivablesOtherCurrentCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`Receivables` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_Receivables')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_Receivables return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfReceivablesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfReceivablesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfReceivablesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesReceivablesBreakdownCooperatives_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfReceivablesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
